mapper.select: select p.product_no productNo, p.main_img mainImg, p.category, p.product_name , r.star star, p.price from product p left join (select product_no, avg(star) star from reviews group by product_no) r on p.product_no = r.product_no where category = 'bed' order by p.product_no desc
